signIn.withSSOAccessibilityLabel: Sign in with single sign on

signUp.withSSOAccessibilityLabel: Sign up with single sign on
signUp.termsLabel: By submitting you agree with our
signUp.termsAccessibilityLabel: Agree to the terms and conditions

forgotPassword.title: Reset password
forgotPassword.subtitle: Please, enter your email address. We will send you a link to create a new password.
forgotPassword.success:
A link was successfully sent your inbox.

Follow the instructions in the email to reset your password.
forgotPassword.error: There was an error sending the password reset email

resetPassword.title: Reset password
resetPassword.subtitle: Please, enter your new password and press on "Reset password".
resetPassword.success:
You've successfully reset your password.
You will be redirected to sign in.

emailVerification.title: Welcome to
emailVerification.emailSent: We've sent you a verification email!
emailVerification.emailVerificationInstructions: Please check your inbox to complete the verification process.

home.title: Welcome!
home.description: We’re excited to have you on board. Please note that this app is a work in progress, and we’re actively building new features to enhance your experience. Stay tuned as we evolve and bring innovative AI-powered functionalities to life. Your journey with us starts here!

deleteAccount.title: Are you sure?
deleteAccount.description: We’re sorry to see you go. Deleting your account will permanently erase all your data, and you will lose access to the app. However, you’re always welcome to create a new account if you decide to return.
deleteAccount.successMessage: Your account has been successfully deleted.

detectAnomaly.title: Smart inspection
detectAnomaly.description: Use your camera to detect faults in industrial parts with machine learning.
detectAnomaly.addDescription: Add any description or comment you think that could help improve the analysis.

fieldError.emailFormatError: Please enter a valid email address
fieldError.firstNameLengthError: First name must be less than 30 characters
fieldError.lastNameLengthError: Last name must be less than 30 characters
fieldError.dobFutureError: Date cannot be in the future
fieldError.dobFormatError: Date of birth format is invalid
fieldError.passwordLengthError: Must be at least 8 characters long
fieldError.passwordLowercaseError: Must contain at least one lowercase letter
fieldError.passwordUppercaseError: Must contain at least one uppercase letter
fieldError.passwordNumberError: Must contain at least one number
fieldError.passwordSpecialCharacterError: Must contain at least one special character
fieldError.termsRequiredError: Please agree to the terms and conditions

error.unexpectedErrorRetry: Something went wrong. Please try again later.
error.serverSideError: There was an error. If the problem persist please contact support.
error.linkCorruptedError: The link appears to be corrupted. Try sending another link.
error.tokenExpiredError: The link has expired. Try sending another link.
error.getProfileDescriptionError: There was a problem getting your profile. Please try again later.
error.refreshSessionError: There was a problem refreshing your session.
error.networkOrServerError: Network error or server error. Please try again later.
error.emailAlreadyVerifiedError: Your email has already been verified. Try to sign in with it.
error.tooManyRequestsError: Too many requests. Wait a minute and try again.
error.linkGeneralError: There was a problem, the link appears to be obsolete or corrupted.
error.googleSSODataError: The Google profile data is not correct.
error.appleSSODataError: The Apple profile data is not correct.
